Node.definition: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= the period of a person's life between childhood and adulthood
= affection between people, or between people and deities
= state in which a woman has recently been married to a man
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= action by which humans scatter seeds or plant young plants in a field so that they may grow into a new crop; ≈ associated with the concept of investing in order to get a return; also associated with reproduction and perpetuation
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten

Node.gloss: to bear one's guilt|to be punished
Node.definition: = to bear the consequences for an unlawful deed for which one is held responsible
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
literally: to find (in someone); hence: = process by which humans come upon certain information
= indirect male progenitor
= the state of being or acting in an unjust or morally evil way
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example
= state in which a condition does not serve any purpose
= action by which humans are engaged in activities that do not serve any purpose

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= causative action or process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to move forward, usually towards a specific destination

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= hole in the ground; ◄ either natural or dug by humans; ► can be used to trap animals; ≈ associated with danger

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= land in which there is a lack of water or rainfall, ► resulting in lack of vegetation and other desert like conditions; ≈ associated with thirst and hardship

literally: shadow of death, only found in poetry; hence: = state in which there is a total absence of light ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer to distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, fear, death, and oblivion

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= land that is suitable for agriculture ◄ as a result of fertility and sufficient rain
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
literally: fruit; hence: = products of the land, ◄ depicted as fruit; ≈ regarded as a blessing from God
= objects that are considered of a good quality and attractive to the eye

= causative action by which humans cause others to become contaminated, ◄ as a result of unlawful activities, ► which often results in their inability to participate in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= causative action by which humans or deities make objects or (other) humans different from what they were before
= people, animals, and inanimate objects that are considered utterly wrong and detestable, because of their condition, their behavior, or because of certain customs
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a reference to an unknown location, but focused on the question whether an object actually exists at all, rather than with a specific location in mind
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
literally: to know (God); hence: = action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity
= action by which a person or group challenges or defies an authority or agreement
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= male deity; ► worshiped by Canaanites (כְּנַעֲנִי) ≈ regarded as the possessor of a certain location
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example
= causative process by which certain objects or activities promote someone's well being
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way
= area located near the sea and/or the people living there; ≈ associated with commerce, remoteness, paganism, but also called on to acknowledge YHWH
= nation regarded as descendants of Javan (יָוָן) son of Japheth (יֶפֶת) possibly to be identified with Greece

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= ethnic group consisting of Arab (עַרְבִי) nomads or Bedouin, known as warriors and sheep herders; ◄ descendants of Kedar
= causative action by which humans or deities send one or more people though the people sent are not mentioned explicitly to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

Node.gloss: to look closely|to take note|to pay attention|to consider|to understand|to draw understanding
Node.definition: = action by which someone observes something carefully, with the intention of seeing through the outward appearance of things and grasping their essence, and so gain knowledge and understanding

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= action by which humans exchange one object for another

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= causative action by which humans exchange an object, person, or deity that is in their possession or that they are associating with for another one
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= causative process by which certain objects or activities promote someone's well being

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

Node.gloss: to be destroyed|to lie in ruins
Node.definition: = state in which land, constructions, or towns have been totally of destroyed, including the people living there, to the extent that sedentary life is no more possible there
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong, resulting in a state of guilt and, eventually, hardship and suffering

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which objects have recently attained a particular state

Node.gloss: to hew out|to dig|to cut out|to dress|to mine
Node.definition: = action by which humans strike an object repeatedly with an axe, chisel, or other sharp implement, ► in order to alter its shape and so create a new object out of it

= hole in the ground, big enough to hold a person and deep enough that a person cannot climb out; ◄ usually dug out of the ground or hewn from rock; ► often used to collect and store rain water; ≈ fresh water from a spring is considered superior to stagnant water from a cistern

= hole in the ground, big enough to hold a person and deep enough that a person cannot climb out; ◄ usually dug out of the ground or hewn from rock; ► often used to collect and store rain water; ≈ fresh water from a spring is considered superior to stagnant water from a cistern
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state in which a container is able to accomodate something within its available space
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical
literally: born of home; hence: = a slave that was born of slave parents, as opposed to a slave that was purchased from outside
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= all sorts of goods, taken forcibly from an enemy in war
= action by which animals, humans, or deities produce a full, deep, prolonged sound as made by a lion; ≈ associated with aggression, but also with suffering
= a young male lion (אֲרִי) ≈ regarded as fierce and dangerous
= causative action by which humans or deities make objects or (other) humans different from what they were before

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

Node.gloss: to set fire on|to set on fire|to be desolated
Node.definition: = action by which someone causes something to start burning, usually with effects on people and nature around; ≈ associated with punishment and judgement|= state/process by which objects are totally damaged by the hands of humans and so be unfit for human use
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= town, also known as Memphis; ◄ in Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) ► residence and capital of many of its kings (ABD)
= town; ◄ Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) on eastern edge of Nile (יְאֹר) delta
literally: to graze; hence: = causative action by which humans remove all that grows from a place ◄ like an animal grazes off all grass and other edible plants
= upper part of the head; ≈ sometimes used in conjunction with feet (רֶגֶל) to refer to the whole physical body
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.gloss: to cause to happen|to bring about
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause events to take place without them having to necessarily be involved in the event itself
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= causative action or process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to move forward, usually towards a specific destination
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
literally: road; hence: = action by which humans are travelling from one place to another
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name
= river; ◄ north eastern delta region of Egypt (מִצְרַיִם)

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
literally: road; hence: = action by which humans are travelling from one place to another
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia

= action by which humans or deities respond to negative behavior of (other) humans by administering some sort of punishment, which may range from a verbal rebuke to physical correction, ► often done with corrective intent, but sometimes also as retribution
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong, resulting in a state of guilt and, eventually, hardship and suffering
= process by which people turning away from someone they had pledged to serve
literally: to judge; hence: = action by which humans or deities inflict a penalty on others as retribution for what they have done
literally: to know; hence: = action by which humans exercise their minds with regards to a certain matter so that they will know what to do

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

Node.gloss: to suffer (harm)|to go badly|to be in trouble
Node.definition: = process by which humans experience difficulty or hardship as a consequence for wrong or harmful behavior
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= process by which someone experiences extreme fear for someone else, ► which may be accompanied by visible symptoms such as trembling
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= bar or frame ◄ normally made of wood ► used to join two draft animals at the neck so that they can work together effectively in pulling a plow, threshing board, harrow, or wagon; ≈ often used in a figurative sense to denote oppression
= material used to tie objects together or to tie animals or humans; ≈ associated with power and control over something or someone else

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity, perform the required rituals, and live in accordance with the requirements of that deity
= an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a mountain (הַר)
= state in which a person or object is of great or more than average height; ≈ associated with status
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit
= a referent to a female participant addressed in a discourse
= woman that sells her body for payment, making of this her profession; ≈ often associated with shame and sinful behavior
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

= action of placing a seed or small plant in the ground so that it will grow and produce ≈ used symbolically to describe God's act of giving the people of Israel their own land, as promised to their ancestors
= a flowering plant’s unit of reproduction, capable of developing into another such plant, in some cases also used as food
= state in which an object is a product of faithfulness and therefore appropriate for its purpose

= referent to the way in which an event is performed; ► normally with the intention of finding out how, but often used in rhetorical questions in order to express one's conviction that that event in question cannot be performed at all (under the given circumstances)
= process by which humans, deities, or objects take on a different nature, character, or form

= a creeping plant that develops a woody stem when it matures; it grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils (שָׂרִיג) ◄ vitis vinifera; ► it bears clusters (אֶשְׁכֹּל) of grapes (עֲנָב) that are sweet and juicy and can be made into wine (יַיִן) ≈ a symbol of blessing, prosperity, and happiness
literally: foreign; hence: = state in which a plant has not been cultivated but grows of itself; ≈ associated with inferior quality
= marker indicating that even if the event in focus is true, another event can take place
= action by which humans remove physical contamination from their bodies by dipping it in water, ≈ used figuratively to denote the removal of guilt
= sodium carbonate ► used as a dye, medicament, and cleansing agent (AYBC)
= substance, ◄ probably made by mixing the ashes of certain soda plants with olive oil, animal fats, or water; ► used as cleansing agent (AYBC)
= state in which dirt is still visible, even after washing
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= referent to the way in which an event is performed; ► normally with the intention of finding out how, but often used in rhetorical questions in order to express one's conviction that that event in question cannot be performed at all (under the given circumstances)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= process by which humans, or objects are or become contaminated, ◄ as a result of contagious diseases or conditions, unlawful activities, or contact with what has been contaminated, ► which often results in their inability of being used or participating in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example
= male deity; ► worshiped by Canaanites (כְּנַעֲנִי) ≈ regarded as the possessor of a certain location
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= a land depression sided or encircled by mountains or elevations
literally: to know; hence: = action by which humans exercise their minds with regards to a certain matter so that they will know what to do

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a young female camel or dromedary (גָּמָל)
= state in which humans, animals, and things have the ability to move or act with speed ◄ due to lack of weight, agility, strength, training, or energy
literally: road; hence: = action by which humans are travelling from one place to another

= wild donkey of a relatively large size but with relatively small ears; it has a fawn color with a whitish chest and belly; ◄ Persian Wild Ass or Onager, Equus hemonius; ≈ associated with both untameable wildness and sexual desire
= state in which animals have adapted themselves to the conditions of a certain environment
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals
= state in which one senses a physical desire for food or sex; ◄ this desire is associated with one's נֶפֶשׁ (נֶפֶשׁ) ≈ and can be both good and evil

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

= action by which animals draw up air through the nose in an audible way; ◄ out of hunger or a desire to mate; ► in order to detect the smell of food or of a mate; ≈ associated with longing and desire

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped
= state in which animals sense a physical desire to have sexual intercourse

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to (cause to) turn back|to cause to cease|to avert|to revoke
Node.definition: literally: to cause (an event) to turn away (from someone else); hence: = causative action by which humans cause a certain condition in which they are not personally involved to come to an end
= action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another
= process by which humans become weak as a result of an extended period of activity
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= state in which humans do not wear shoes or sandals ► in order to be able to walk faster
= state in which someone senses a feeling of needing or wanting to drink, ► which eventually leads to weakness or even death; ≈ also used in a figurative sense to denote a longing or desire

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call|to give up|to consider useless|to consider hopeless
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken|= process by which someone resigns to being unable to change a situation, and gives up trying to do so
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= a person considered as not belonging to a certain group, be it religious, ethnic, or social
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is committed to follow Y's leadership and example
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= human who secretly takes possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it
= process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit
= a person, ◄ compared to a father, ► who is the originator of a certain process; ≈ said about God only
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= an object ◄ of stone, ► usually found in nature and used for throwing, building crude constructions; stones with a particular shape are sometimes used as a memorial or religious symbol; ≈ regarded as extremely common, easily available, but also as strong, hard, and unflexible
= a referent to a female participant addressed in a discourse
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= a reference to an unknown location, but focused on the question whether an object actually exists at all, rather than with a specific location in mind
plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior
= the quantity of a number of objects or the frequency of a number of events

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way
= action by which a person or group challenges or defies an authority or agreement
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which objects or activities do not serve a valid purpose and can only lead to disappointment

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= causative action by which deities offer primarily verbal instruction to humans, which may occasionally be accompanied by physical punishment, given as a result of misbehavior or to prevent misbehavior, ► aimed to teach the receiver (and sometimes other people as well) wisdom and good behavior
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state of total absence of light; ≈ associated with difficult circumstances

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= young unmarried woman, who has never been married before, and has never had sex with a man
= woman who is about to be married or has just been married; ≈ often associated with joy
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = part of female attire, worn around the body
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
literally: there is no counting (of it); hence: = state in which events cannot be counted or measured because of their frequency or intensity

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= action by which humans perform activities with a certain amount of skill
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= state in which humans experience the desire to attain a certain status or condition and do what is needed to make this a reality
= affection between people, or between people and deities

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong, resulting in a state of guilt and, eventually, hardship and suffering

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= part where converging sides or edges of an object meet; ≈ sometimes associated with the far side of an object
literally: to be found (in a place); hence: = state in which humans or objects are located in a certain place

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God
= state in which humans are not held responsible for actions committed in the past or for future commitments
= process of making a hole in the ground or a wall; + usually with the help of a digging tool; ► in order to be able to gain access to the location behind it; agent: human
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to be free|to be innocent|to go unpunished
Node.definition: = state or process in which humans are not held responsible for actions committed in the past or for future commitments
= particle limiting the focus to one phrase and so enhancing its truth value

Node.gloss: to turn away|to come to an end|to cease|to subside
Node.definition: literally: (an event) turns away (from someone); hence: = process by which a certain condition comes to an end
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to act lightly|to behave in a despicable manner
Node.definition: = process by which humans act in a way that is considered unworthy of respect

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH
= action by which humans complete a task with the expected or desired outcome
